title: Shaun the Sheep: The Flight Before Christmas
writer: Nick Park, Giles Pilbrow, Mark Burton

cast: Justin Fletcher, John Sparkes, Laura Aikman, Marcus Brigstocke, Kate Harbour, Anna Leong-Brophy
